title: theHelpbitcoin
author: theHelpbitcoin
content: Hello, need help,how to recover my bitcoins, on my HD wallet, by Bitcoin Core? (hierarchical determinist)bitcoins and satoshis are not there, the wallet is old and has a large key pool! It's a hdwallet!commands to write?? a page to learn everything about HDwallets ? One Helping ?

comments.author: Bitcoin Smith
comments.body: Avoid creating multiple topics for the same question, just stick with the one you created already.

comments.author: Knight Hider
comments.body: Quote from: theHelpbitcoin on September 18, 2023, 04:48:04 PMbitcoins and satoshis are not there,What steps did you take?--Knight Hider

comments.author: DifDrama
comments.body: BIP32 is the Bitcoin Improvement Proposal that introduced HD wallets. This document is highly technical but contains detailed information on the structure and functioning of HD wallets.Here is the link: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0032.mediawiki
